snippet.title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms | Teaser
snippet.description:
Get your Steam or GOG Early Access key in advance through our crowdfunding campaign at https://www.fig.co/vagrus. 
Buying your key there helps us keep a bigger percentage of the proceeds so we can spend that on additional content, features, and polish. 

Vagrus - The Riven Realms is a Strategy-Roleplaying Game for PC, in which the player takes the role of a vagrus - a sort of a caravan leader, who makes a living on a strange and dangerous dark fantasy world by taking a traveling company on all kinds of ventures.
Besides its story-rich narrative, the game features tactical turn-based combat and strategy elements, such as elaborate cargo, crew, and character management systems.

Keys for Press and Content creators:
   - Woovit: https://woovit.info/vagrus

PressKit: http://vagrus.com/press/

Wishlist and follow Vagrus on: 
   - Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/909660/Vagrus__The_Riven_Realms/
   - GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/vagrus_the_riven_realms

Follow us on your favorite media channel:
   -  Vagrus Homepage: https://vagrus.com/
   -  Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/vagrus
   -  Facebook: http://facebook.com/LostPilgrimsStudio
   -  Twitter: http://twitter.com/lostpilgrims
   -  Instagram: http://instagram.com/lostpilgrims/
   -  Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lostpilgrims
   -  Discord: https://discord.gg/vagrus

Try the Demo build of Vagrus on:
   -  Discord: https://discord.gg/vagrus
   -  GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/vagrus_the_riven_realms_prologue
